entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 in wind prone areas. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1800 metres. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 in wind prone areas early in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
